ingredients.item: 2 essential Waitrose onions, halved and finely sliced
4 essential Waitrose british chicken thighs, skinned and cubed

instructions.step: Soak the rice in cold water while you prepare the rest of the ingredients.  Heat the butter in a pan and saute the onions until golden, about 10 minutes. Add the chicken and brown on all sides.  Add the garlic and curry paste and stir for a minute.  Drain the rice, rinse, then add to the pan with the stock. Bring to the boil, lower the heat to a simmer and cover. Cook for 10 minutes, then add the peas; cook for a further 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and leave, covered, for 5 minutes.  Roughly chop the coriander and stir half through the biryani. Scatter the remaining coriander over the top and serve.
